description: Add support for downloading to a filename, seekable file-like object, and nonseekable file-like object.
Add ``TransferManager`` class. All public functionality for ``s3transfer`` is exposed through this class.
Add subscriber interface. Currently supports on_queued, on_progress, and on_done status changes.
Add support for uploading a filename, seekable file-like object, and nonseekable file-like object.
